info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 7:18PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Calhoun and Jackson counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, heavy at times is being reported at all reporting stations in the Winter Storm Warning area. Radar and satellite loops suggest the snow will continue heavy at time until around midnight. Expect snowfall rates as high as 1 inch per hour until around midnight. The combination of temperatures falling into the mid 20s and north winds gusting to near 30 mph at times, will result in some blowing and drifting of the snow, making travel conditions even more hazardous.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
